2020.title: NPClassifier
2020.description: NPClassifier is the first deep-learning tool for the automated structural classification of NPs.

2020.title: Deep Docking
2020.description: Deep Docking is a deep learning-based approach which is suited for docking billions of molecular structures.

2020.title: Pangolin
2020.description: Pangolin allows a user to assign a SARS-CoV-2 genome sequence the most likely lineage (Pango lineage) to SARS-CoV-2 query sequences.

2020.title: Somalier
2020.description: Somalier is a tool that can rapidly evaluate relatedness from sequencing data.

2020.title: RRE-finder
2020.description: RRE-finder identifies RRE domains, which are present in a majority of prokaryotic RiPP biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs).
